none.info: Please ask your household members for an invite link, or create a home.

leave.info:
Are you sure you want to leave {home}?
You will need an invite link to join again.

delete.info:
Are you sure you want to delete {home}?
The home and its towels will be irreversibly deleted.

remove.info:
Are you sure to remove {member} from {home}?
The user will need an invite link to join again.

invite.info: Sharing this link with people will enable them to join this home.
